Name: Now I Am There
About the game: The story begins when the robot, whose experiment was interrupted, begins working again years later in an abandoned laboratory. Complete challenging trails and puzzles. Explore venues reflecting different periods. Earn achievements by finding hidden rooms. Play the script and review your world ranking according to the time it takes to finish the chapters, compete with your opponents. Defuse the guard robots using the teleportation capability of the crystals. Complete the parkour before they die by being agile, solve difficult puzzles and try to escape from the lab. You can teleport to a certain point using the teleportation power obtained from the teleportation crystal. Solve puzzles and discover stories using a limited number of teleportation crystals in each section.
